title: Multi-Cluster Collaboration Strategies for Advanced Optimization Algorithm Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of optimization algorithms (e.g., PSO), foundational calculus and linear algebra, and programming skills (Python/Matlab)
context.additional_context: Case study on algorithm optimization for language domain applications

learning_goals: Explain the operational principles of a multi-cluster collaborative structure and implement them in a simulation environment.
Apply cluster classification strategies using Hidden Markov Models (HMM) to optimization problems.
Improve convergence speed and local optima avoidance performance through adaptive parameter adjustment techniques.

resources: Instructional Materials and Case Study Resources

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
